0111000000001010 0000111001001010 1 -> sum: 0111111001010101, cout: 0
0001100110100011 0010001110111110 1 -> sum: 0011110101100010, cout: 0
1111100100111100 1010001000001100 1 -> sum: 1001101101001001, cout: 1

1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
